name: Drawing Boy (furry print)
description:
"Coping" has teamed up with Drawing Boards to bring you these limited edition prints to keep the cold weather at bay  ...... Grab these puppys while you still can .. to get a better look go to ..
http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_ZN3VtppMt48/SNrUeHsnjjI/AAAAAAAAARw/pkmXl4LsexY/s1600-h/hoods2blog+copy.jpg
Postage and Packing is free too

name: Drawing Boards
description:
FREE P+P to the UK <<
This ones fresh in from Drawing Boards ... drawn by AD .. People had been asking for one of his skulls to be put on a T'shirt but it had to be more tech than just a plain skull on a shirt ... The swords are pencils ... It's high quality screen-print .. none of ya vinyl poop ..blah blah ... can't be bothered to write anymore .. it' comes in black or white .. buy it if you know what's good .. medium , Large or XL ..

name: Flying Pencil Hoods  [Free P+P]
description:
Fresh in Heavy weight Hood to keep you warm through the winter .. In association with Drawing Boards ... www.thedrawingboards.com ..

 Also available in black in all sizes , different color prints too ... so if you're interested to know what, either check the Drawing Boards blog or email us.

Indorsed by Mr Dibbs himself ...

 Peace.

name: Pingco - Grey [Free P+P]
description:
Based on a toy that kids played with, we are still playing with toys. The word Pingco is an anagram of coping, play well.

	This is a heavy weight zip hoodie made with 100% cotton, fleece lining and a felt print. Zips up higher than your average garment…!

	100% made in the UK.

	XL only

name: Drawing Boards Flower T -  [Free P+P]
description:
